title: Request a Building Inspection
description: A construction contractor needs to schedule a framing inspection for a new home build.

tasks.description: Identify the contractor and the building permit number for the property.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the active building permit.

tasks.description: Check the available time slots for a building inspector.
Schedule the framing inspection for the requested date and time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the inspection and provides a confirmation.
